articles.title: Funeral Held for Late Pak Song Chol
articles.content:
Funeral Held for Late Pak Song Chol
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A funeral was held for Pak Song Chol, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and honorary vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					Attending the funeral were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Il Chol, Choe Thae Bok and other members of the state funeral committee, officials concerned and family members and relatives of the deceased.
					
					 Standing on either side of the bier were guards of honor of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Before the start of the funeral procession, the participants paid silent tribute to the late Pak.
					
					 At 8 a.m. the hearse left the hall. 
					
					 A funeral service took place on the spot.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a funeral oration.
					
					 He said that Pak Song Chol's life was a worthwhile one as he glorified the greatest honor and worthy life of a revolutionary soldier thanks to the warm love and benevolent care of the Party and the leader, adding that the feats performed by him for the Party and the revolution, the country and its people would be always remembered. 
					
					The remains of the deceased were buried in the grave amid the playing of a dirge and the firing of volley.
					
					 A wreath sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il was laid before the grave.
					
					 Wreaths from different units including the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, the DPRK Cabinet and armed forces organs were placed before it.
					
					 The participants in the funeral paid silent tribute to the deceased.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry's Spokesman Slams U.S. Military Attack on Syria
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry's Spokesman Slams U.S. Military Attack on Syria
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Thursday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the U.S. recent military attack on Syria:
					Helicopters of the U.S. forces attacked a civilian target inside the Syrian territory 8 km from the border with Iraq on Oct. 26, killing innocent civilians including women and children.
					
					Despite this act of aggression, the U.S. is getting so brazen-faced as to justify it, claiming that its forces conducted a successful surprise operation against foreign bellicose elements.
					
					 The above-said military attack is an unpardonable inhuman criminal act as it is an undisguised infringement upon the sovereignty and territorial integrity of a sovereign state and state terrorism committed under the pretext of "anti-terrorism war."
					
					The DPRK vehemently denounces the U.S. grave infringement upon the dignity and territorial integrity of Syria and sends full support and solidarity to the Syrian government and people in their just efforts and measures to defend the sovereignty and security of the country.

articles.title: FM of Myanmar and His Party Wind up Visit to DPRK
articles.content:
FM of Myanmar and His Party Wind Up Visit to DPRK
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of Myanmar U Nyan Win and his party left for home today after winding up their four day-visit to the DPRK.
					During their stay, they visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the e-Library of Kim Chaek University of Technology.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Yemeni President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Yemeni President
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of sympathy to Ali Abdullah Saleh, President of Yemen, on Wednesday as regards the recent downpour which hit various provinces of Yemen,  causing big human and material losses. 
					 In the message Kim Yong Nam extended deep sympathy and consolation to the victims and bereaved families and hoped that the Yemeni president and government would eradicate the aftermath of the natural disaster as early as possible.

articles.title: Greetings to Romanian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Romanian FM
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to his Romanian counterpart Lazar Comanescu on Oct. 26 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Romania.
					 Expressing the belief that the relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger in the mutual interests in the future, too, the message wished him greater success in his job.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Public Presentation and Symposiums Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Public Presentation and Symposiums Held
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological public presentation in the field of information science, the 20th national acupuncture and moxibustion and constitutional medical science symposium and the 4th national Kyongrak symposium took place at the Grand People's Study House from Oct. 27 to 29.
					The participants of the events heard papers dealing with research successes and experience which are of significance in implementing the Party's line of attaching importance to science and technology, developing the IT and putting the Koryo medical science on a new high level. 
					
					Scientists and technicians in the field of information science introduced achievements made in the research work to round off the method of supporting the information analysis and information service and the system of searching for literature and information including the display and search for Korean texts in the Korean-style computer controlling system and the setting up of library in the      e-library system.
					
					Widely discussed at the public presentation were scientific and technological issues arising in improving the method of processing information and the information system including the system of searching for image by use of color character, rhythm modeling with the help of decision tree in the speech mixing of the Korean language and the recognition of cursive characters.
					
					The participants of the medical science symposiums heard papers dealing with essentials of the principle to govern the treatment by use of acupuncture and moxibustion, the successes made by the scientists and technicians in the field of public health in the course of researches to further develop the Koryo medical science.
					
					Drawing the attention of the participants were achievements and experience gained in the researches into Kyongrak, essentials of acupuncture and moxibustion, clinical treatment by those things and physical condition through an active use of modern means, various methods of using acupuncture for treating different kinds of chronic diseases and the hand treatment effective for increasing bone formative influence.

articles.title: Friendship Gathering Held
articles.content:
Friendship Gathering Held
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A friendship gathering was held Thursday under the sponsorship of the DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and eastern European countries.
					Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and embassy officials of Poland, the Czech Republic, Romania and Bulgaria, delegations of foreign ministries of the Slovak Republic and Hungary and diplomatic envoys of other countries here.
					
					 On hand were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung and officials concerned. 
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Its participants talked to one another about the need to boost the relations between the DPRK and European countries.

articles.title: Day of United Nations Observed
articles.content:
Day of United Nations Observed
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Jean Pierre De Margerie, acting resident coordinator of the UN to the DPRK, hosted a reception on Wednesday on the occasion of the Day of the United Nations.
					 Present there on invitation were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					 Representatives of international organizations here were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Chinese Diplomats Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Chinese Diplomats Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy Thursday visited the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Cooperative Farm in Sunan District, Pyongyang, and helped its members in harvesting.
					 The guests gave helping hands to them in rice threshing.
					
					The ambassador expressed hope that the farmers there would achieve greater success in the agricultural production.  
					
					 The guests handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Women's Football Match between DPRK and Ghana Held
articles.content:
Women's Football Match between DPRK and Ghana Held
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A match between the DPRK team and the Ghanaian team belonging to Group B of group league matches of the FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup New Zealand 2008 was held on Oct. 29.
					 The heated seesaw match between the two teams ended in a 1-1 draw.

articles.title: Research into Environmental Protection in DPRK
articles.content:
Research into Environmental Protection in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A great attention is being directed to research into environmental protection in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Research Institute of Environmental Protection under the Ministry of Land and Environment Conservation has recently developed a new atmospheric environment management aid system which is of weighty significance in putting the atmospheric environment management on IT.
					
					The system is attracting attention of experts as it makes it possible to take accurate measurement of the air pollution distribution and manage the environmental conservation in an effective way.
					
					The system estimates the atmospheric environment in a given city or given region in a scientific way on the basis of the air pollutants diffusion model in various topographies, thus greatly helping toward the environmental policy-making of the country.
					
					 Along with it, the system programs the research into yellow dust, which had been relied mainly on observation data, so as to give a correct analysis of its influence on climate and forecast its prospect.
					
					 The institute has also made a new progress in the research into environment management system at industrial establishments.
					
					 Scientists of the institute have set environmental pollution objects in the given units and developed a dust extraction device for removing gas and dust emitted in the production processes and materials for ensuring the environmental safety of goods.
					
					 Meanwhile, the institute has fully solved technical problems to put water replacement on a new scientific foundation on the basis of detailed investigation of the change of general water quality in River Taedong.

articles.title: Tangun's Mausoleum, Historic National Treasure
articles.content:
Tangun's Mausoleum, Historic National Treasure
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Tangun's Mausoleum in Kangdong County, Pyongyang, is a historic national treasure. It consists of the district of the monument to the reconstruction of Tangun's Mausoleum, district of stone human statues and central district.
					There stand the sculptures of the sons of Tangun and subjects close to him in the district of stone human statues in rows right and left of the stone staircase.
					
					Seen in the central district are the mausoleum on a foundation, a stone table, stone incense burner and a pair of stone posts in front of it.
					
					The mausoleum is in the form of quadrangular pyramid. A stone tiger sculpture guards it in each corner.
					
					A tower of the pipha-shaped dagger, a typical weapon in the period of ancient Korea, stands in each outer corner of the central district.
					
					Two platforms for coffins in which the remains of Tangun and his wife lie are laid side by side from south to north on the floor of the chamber.
					
					Hanging on the front wall of the chamber is the portrait of Tangun.
					
					The mausoleum shows the developed culture and the political, economic and military might in the period of Tangun's Korea. It, based on the traditional tomb style of the nation, is a cultural treasure rich in national character.
					
					It is thanks to the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il that Tangun, the ancestral father of the nation, was discovered and ascertained as real figure and the national history spanning 5000 years was recovered.
					
					After acquainting himself with the legends on Tangun associated with Mts. Kuwol and Myohyang and the data on the Tangun's Mausoleum in Kangdong County, Pyongyang, the President initiated its excavation. After its discovery and scientific investigation of the data, he called at the mausoleum to see all the relics and scrupulously led scholars and officials so they might study and systematize the history of Tangun and ancient Korea in a proper way.
					
					Kim Jong Il saw to it that all conditions were provided to conduct the research into Tangun and ancient Korea on a latest scientific foundation.
					
					As a result, it was proved in a scientific way that Tangun was not a mythological being but a real figure who was born 5011 years ago from the year of 1993.
					
					Kim Jong Il looked round the reconstructed mausoleum on October 29, Juche 83 (1994) and instructed officials that the mausoleum should be preserved and managed as a historic national treasure.
					
					The mausoleum instills national pride into the minds of the Korean people.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Drop Its Scenario for Preemptive Attack on DPRK
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Drop Its Scenario for Preemptive Attack on DPRK
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- To mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK at present only precipitates Japan's self-destruction and national ruin. The Japanese militarists should bear this in mind and refrain from rash acts, warns Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article.
					The Japanese militarist forces are frantically pushing ahead with the militarist moves, persistently raising a hue and cry over the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The Japanese reactionaries are asserting that Japan should do its utmost to "defend" itself because the DPRK is "threatening Japan's security". This sheer sophism can never help them cover up their true colors as they consider a preemptive attack as a trite method of aggression.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the Sino-Japanese War, the Russo-Japanese War, Japan's invasion of Manchuria of China, "the July 7 incident" and attack on Pearl Harbor were triggered off by preemptive attacks of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					The Japanese imperialists perished in the flames kindled by themselves for making preemptive attacks.
					
					Japan earned the ill fame of being a defeated state after the Second World War. However, it has rushed headlong into the revival of militarism and rearming with a wild ambition for revenge, far from drawing a bitter lesson from its defeat. It has emerged a dangerous war force equipped with modern armed forces for aggression.
					
					The Japanese militarist forces, obsessed with their ambition for reinvasion, are waiting for an opportunity to mount a sudden preemptive attack on the DPRK. However, the Japanese reactionaries are making a serious miscalculation. If they dare attack the DPRK, failing to properly understand its mental power and military might, they will not escape a bitter defeat and disgrace.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Halt Its Rash Acts
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Urged to Halt Its Rash Acts
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- If the Lee Myung Bak group persists in its confrontation with the DPRK, subservient to foreign forces despite the DPRK's warnings and advices, it will not escape from a stern punishment by history and the people.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday warns this in a signed article.
					
					The group is kicking up an unprecedentedly reckless racket of confrontation with the DPRK in league with foreign forces, pushing the inter-Korean relations to total collapse, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					It is just eight months since traitor Lee Myung Pak came to power but the crimes he has committed against the country and the nation excel all those crimes of the preceding ruling quarters in their number and gravity. The biggest crime committed by the group after its seizure of power was that it brought the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase in their history, pursuant to the U.S. imperialists' policy of aggression against the DPRK. No sooner had the group wrested power than came out to totally negate the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration hailed and supported not only by all Koreans but by the world people and has persistently hamstrung their implementation, thus bringing to light its true colors as the foe of reunification. 
					
					The serious crimes the group has committed since it came to power are that it has gone so reckless as debasing and challenging the DPRK's ideology, system and its supreme dignity, openly disclosing its wild ambition for invading the north.
					
					Denying the system of the other side while perpetrating dangerous military provocations against it can be done only by aggressors on the eve of the war to be started by them. 
					
					The group's reckless attempt to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK is a foolish and ridiculous act reminiscent of a newborn puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					In the confrontation and war with this group of traitors the DPRK will achieve reunification and lose nothing but the Military Demarcation Line. Should the group ignite a war against the north at any cost as nuclear war servants for the U.S. imperialists, nobody will come out to save them and consequently, they will perish in the flames kindled by them. 
					
					The Lee group would be well advised to stop its rash acts, properly understanding the DPRK's stand and will, and cease at once standing in the way of developing the inter-Korean relations and achieving peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Puppet Military Authorities Sued in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Military Authorities Sued in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The publishing houses and authors who published the books which the puppet ministry of National Defence designated as "seditious books" filed a damages suit in the Seoul Central District Court against it on Oct. 27, according to south Korean KBS.
					18 authors including Han Hong Gu and Hong Se Hwa, professors at Songgonghoe University and four publishing houses in the suit regarded it illegal for the ministry to have labeled books of 23 kinds "seditious books" and banned their distribution under the pretext that "the books praised the north and they are of anti-'government,' anti-U.S. and anti-capitalist nature."
					
					They held that this is a crude violation of the fundamental right, and defamation, demanding the ministry pay damages for the above-said action.

articles.title: Punishment of Those Who Expropriated Subsidies for Rice Cultivators Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Those Who Expropriated Subsidies for Rice Cultivators Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea made public a statement on Oct. 24 in which it demanded stern punishment of those who expropriated subsidies for rice cultivators.
					 The statement recalled that those who expropriated subsidies for rice cultivators without doing farm work have numbered 170,000-280,000 till now and among them are more than 100 high-ranking officials including the former vice-minister of Health, Welfare and Families, in particular.
					
					 It was due to their wrongs that more than 70,000 peasants who are truly engaged in the farm work have not received those subsidies, it charged, and went on:
					
					 High-ranking officials' expropriation of the above-said subsidies is little short of theft.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime is shutting its eyes and keeping mum about its high-ranking officials tainted with irregularities and corruption and illegal practices, while indiscriminately suppressing the people who turned out with candles in protest against the import of American beef under the pretext of "enforcing legal order."
					
					 The Lee "government" should bear in mind that it will only face a stern punishment not only by the peasants but other people in case it covers up  the case in a bid to evade people's criticism and patronizes the "Cabinet  of rich land owners" again.

articles.title: Indictment against Members of Pro-Reunification Organization Refuted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Indictment against Members of Pro-Reunification Organization Refuted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Joint Defense Panel of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea refuted the indictment of the puppet prosecution against members of the solidarity on Oct. 24.
					 The panel recalled that on the same day the prosecution authorities detained and indicted four leading members of the organization by invoking the article "charge of forming and joining in an organization benefiting the enemy" of the "National Security Law", terming it suppression of them under the pretext of "security" going against the trend of the times as well as part of retaliation against candlelight actions.
					
					 It accused the prosecution authorities of labeling in their indictment the solidarity an "enemy-benefiting organization aimed at praising and encouraging the north or sympathizing with it" while branding all its activities as "actions benefiting the enemy."
					
					Lurking behind this is a reactionary design to disturb and block national reconciliation and cooperation and bring to collapse the inter-Korean relations which have favorably developed since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, it held, adding:
					
					 The prosecution authorities' act of cracking down upon the organization labeling its activities "enemy-benefiting ones" is an intolerable anachronistic action. 
					
					 The panel stressed that in the future, it would thoroughly probe the conservative media's possible release of false reports after the prosecution authorities' suppression and take a positive action against it and, at the same time, disclose in the course of trial the injustice of the above-said suppression on the charge of violation of the NSL quite contrary to the trend of the times.

articles.title: Efectuados funerales del difunto Pak Song Chol
articles.content:
Efectuados funerales del difunto Pak Song Chol
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar este jueves en esta capital los funerales del difunto Pak Song Chol, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente honorario del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					 Al acto asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Il Chol, Choe Thae Bok y otros miembros del Comite Funerario Estatal, los funcionarios correspondientes, los familiares y parientes del difunto.
					
					 A ambos lados del feretro estaban de pie los guardias de honor del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					 Antes de la partida del feretro, los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de Pak.
					
					 A las 8 de la manana, partio el feretro del difunto.
					
					 Se efectuo la ceremonia de despedida en el mismo lugar.
					
					 La oracion funebre estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					 Pak vivio toda su vida con gran honor, valor y dignidad de soldado revolucionario en el regazo afectuoso y benevolo del partido y el lider, dijo el orador y enfatizo que seran eternas sus proezas realizadas por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Mientras se interpretaba la musica de la ocasion y se disparaban las salvas, fueron enterrados los restos mortales de Pak.
					
					 Fue depositada al pie de la tumba la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Tambien, fueron colocadas las otras a nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC, el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, los organos de las Fuerzas Armadas y otras varias unidades.
					
					 Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia ataque militar de EE.UU. contra Siria
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia ataque militar de EE.UU. contra Siria
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central  de Corea formulada con motivo del reciente ataque militar de Estados Unidos contra Siria, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 30 la siguiente respuesta:
					 El dia 26, los helicopteros estadounidenses atacaron un objeto civil de Siria a los 8 kilometros de distancia de la frontera con Iraq y asesinaron a los inocentes habitantes incluso las mujeres y ninos. 
					
					 Sin embargo, EE.UU. justifica descaradamente su invasion calificandola de "exitosa operacion de ataque  sorpresivo contra los belicistas extranjeros". 
					
					 El ataque militar de EE.UU. contra Siria deviene un terror estatal e intolerable crimen que bajo el pretexto de la "guerra antiterrorista" violo abiertamente la soberania y la integridad territorial del Estado soberano. 
					
					Denunciamos categoricamente las acciones militares de EE.UU. que atento gravemente la dignidad y la integridad territorial de Siria y exteriorizamos nuestro entero apoyo y solidaridad a los justos esfuerzos y medidas del gobierno y el pueblo de Siria por defender la soberania y la seguridad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente de Yemen
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam expresa condolencias al presidente de Yemen
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 29 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Republica del Yemen, Ali Abdullah Saleh, con motivo de que varias provincias de este pais sufrieron muchas perdidas humanas y materiales por la lluvia torrencial. 
					El remitente expresa profunda compasion y condolencias a las victimas y los familiares de los difuntos y desea que el mandatario y el gobierno del Yemen resarzan cuanto antes las consecuencias del desastre natural.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ambicion de ataque de militaristas japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ambicion de ataque de militaristas japoneses
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ATCC) -- Los militaristas japoneses deben actuar con prudencia al tener presente que en la epoca actual, el ataque preventivo es el camino de suicidio y arruinamiento para su pais.
					 Asi advierte el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					Las fuerzas militaristas japonesas maniobran demencialmente cuestionando obstinadamente la "amenaza nuclear y de misil" proveniente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Aunque los reaccionarios japoneses insisten en que proviene de la RPDC la "amenaza a la seguridad" de Japon y en que este debe hacer todo lo posible para la "defensa", nunca podran ocultar su habito cronico de agredir a otros paises mediante el ataque preventivo.
					
					Hay de sobra los ejemplos de ello: la guerra China-Japon, la Rusia-Japon, la invasion a Manchuria, el "Incidente del 7 de julio" y el asalto a Perl Harbor.
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses, que preferian ese metodo ofensivo, murieron en las llamas encendidas por si mismos.
					
					Tildado de pais derrotado al finalizarse la Segunda Guerra Mundial, en lugar de sacar lecciones de esto, Japon marcho galopante con el revanchismo por el camino hacia el resurgimiento del militarismo y el rearme. 
					
					 Practicamente, Japon emergio como peligroso pais belico con modernas fuerzas armadas agresoras. 
					
					 Los muy equivocados militaristas japoneses, enloquecidos por retomar el camino de agresion,  estan acechando la oportunidad para atacar a la RPDC de manera preventiva y sorpresiva. 
					
					Si ellos se atreven a abalanzarse sobre la RPDC sin ver correctamente la fuerza espiritual y el poderio militar de esta, probaran el amargo sabor de la derrota y humillacion.
